name: Nova Recon
description: You play as Alexander Midas, who went and trained to be soldier at the NRS. After joining NRS, he made a name for himself as Alexander the Great, due to his 100 percent mission success rate. Now he is on his hardest mission yet, an enemy ship crashed by HQ, in a search and destroy mission with high risk, what will happen on this mission? Will he succeed? Will he die? Will he make a shocking discovery?
